Package com.oopsipushedtomain

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.oopsipushedtomain.User.User
public class User extends Object
This class defines and represents a user It also includes all database accesses for user functions

Outstanding Issues: - Need to implement more error checking - Need to implement a delete function

See Also:

      Parameters:
      context - The context this function is called from
      Returns:
      A Geopoint containing the last known location of the user
